text: Arba is an unincorporated community in Greensfork Township, Randolph County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== Arba was settled by Quakers as early as 1815. A post office was established at Arba in 1849, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1911. ==Geography== Arba is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Randolph County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Arba, Indiana
